altar_medium.text: There's a prize waiting for you at the temple!
Don't worry, you're in good hands! I'm a surgeon!
It's cool, I promise! I'm a doctor!
You're not attached to that heart, are you?
Is it cool if I cut you open and take your heart?

worship_medium.text: It's our duty to worship the gods, so get to it.
The gods require constant worship, so get to it.
You know what'd be great? Some hardcore worship action.

festival_medium.text: I want you to dance like nobody's watching!
I wanna see you shake that THANG, yo!
You know what'd be great? Some hardcore festival action.

babble_medium.text: Gods grant me the serenity to accept the things I cannot change, and the courage to sacrifice my friends. Also,
Beer is constant proof that the Gods love us and love to see us happy. Also,
In the first place, the Gods made idiots. That was for practice. Then they made school boards. Also,
Only one thing is impossible for the Gods: To find any sense in any copyright law on the planet. Also,
Man was made at the end of the week's work when the Gods were tired. Also,
Under certain circumstances, profanity provides a relief denied even to prayer. Also,
There are times when one would like to hang the whole human race, and finish the farce. Also,
The rule is perfect: in all matters of opinion our adversaries are insane. Also,
Only kings, gods, and people with tapeworms have the right to use the editorial 'we.' Also,
There are several good protections against temptation, but the surest is cowardice. Also,
I don't like to commit myself about heaven and hell - you see, I have friends in both places. Also,
Between two evils, I always pick the one I never tried before. Also,
Do not worry about avoiding temptation. As you grow older it will avoid you. Also,
I distrust camels, and anyone else who can go a week without a drink. Also,
Cleanliness becomes more important when godliness is unlikely. Also,
